summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Quiet Housekeeper Phase 2 enhancements. All major new features working excellently: 6-step onboarding flow, AI-powered Brain Offload, Weekly Reset reflection, Enhanced Bills with due soon section, and new navigation. Minor issue with onboarding completion persistence affecting dashboard access.

ui_bugs.issue: Onboarding completion doesn't persist properly - dashboard doesn't load after completing onboarding
ui_bugs.workaround: Individual pages work when accessed directly

passed_tests: Brain Offload AI integration with GPT-5.1 (task organization into today/this_week/later)
Complete 6-step onboarding flow (About You, Home & Responsibilities, Bills & Admin, Energy & Check-ins, Emotional Layer, Life Snapshot)
Weekly Reset Flow with reflection form (wins, challenges, feeling, 3 anchors)
Enhanced Bills page with due soon section (next 7 days)
Autopay indicators and color coding on bills
Brain Offload page - AI-powered thought organization
Weekly view page - task summaries and bill overview
Tone consistency - gentle, compassionate language throughout
Responsive UI elements with proper data-testid attributes
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix onboarding completion persistence issue - dashboard should load properly after completing the 6-step onboarding flow. The localStorage.setItem('onboarding_complete', 'true') may not be persisting correctly or the dashboard route protection logic needs adjustment.
